heading: Recruitments are now open!
body: Core team and volunteer recruitments are now open. If you're enthusiastic about contributing, organizing events, and being part of a dedicated team, this is your chance to get involved and make a real impact. As a core team member or volunteer, you'll gain hands-on experience in planning, execution, and teamworkâ€”while helping shape some of the most exciting events on campus. Whether you're a seasoned organizer or just getting started, we welcome your passion and ideas.
